title: Question 14
prompt:
The illustration shows three growing plants, a light bulb shining above them, and a shade blocking some of the light. The plant on the left is completely in the light. The plant in the middle is halfway in the light. The plant on the right is completely shaded.

The student conducting this experiment has a hypothesis that the plant receiving more light will grow more. The amount of light is the _________ variable and the growth of the plant is the _________ variable.
feedback: The student conducting this experiment has a hypothesis that the plant receiving more light will grow more. The amount of light is the Independent variable and the growth of the plant is the dependent variable.
